clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Chemo Only Versus Chemo Plus Nivo With or Without BMS-986205, Followed by Post- Surgery Therapy With Nivo or Nivo and BMS-986205 in Patients With MIBC
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Randomized, Study of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Alone Versus Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Plus Nivolumab or Nivolumab and BMS-986205, Followed by Continued Post- Surgery Therapy With Nivolumab or Nivolumab and BMS-986205 in Participants With Muscle- Invasive Bladder Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: A study to evaluate nivolumab + chemotherapy or nivolumab/ BMS-986205 + chemotherapy followed by continued Immuno-Oncology therapy after radical cystectomy (RC) compared with neoadjuvant standard of care (SOC) chemotherapy alone in patients with muscle-invasive bladder cancer (MIBC)

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Pathological Complete Response (pCR) rate, in all randomized participants
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of Arm B to Arm A; and Comparison of Arm C to Arm A

primary_outcome.measure: Event-Free Survival (EFS), in all randomized participants
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of Arm B to Arm A; and Comparison of Arm C to Arm A;

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Survival (OS) in all randomized participants
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of Arm C vs Arm A; and Comparison of Arm B vs Arm A

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events (AE) in all treated participants
Incidence of Serious Adverse Events (SAE) in all treated participants
Incidence of Laboratory abnormalities in all treated participants
Incidence of death in all treated participants
Pathological Complete Response (pCR) rate, in all randomized participants
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of Arm B v Arm C

secondary_outcome.measure: Event Free Survival (EFS), in all randomized participants
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of Arm B v Arm C

arm_group.description: Chemotherapy alone followed by radical cystectomy
BMS-986205 Placebo + Nivolumab + Chemotherapy followed by BMS-986205 Placebo + Nivolumab post radical cystectomy
BMS-986205 + Nivolumab + Chemotherapy followed by Nivolumab plus BMS-986205 post radical cystectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants with MIBC, clinical stage T2-T4a, N0 (<10 mm on CT or MRI), M0, diagnosed at TURBT and confirmed by radiographic imaging. Variant histology is acceptable if there is a predominant urothelial component.
- Participant must be deemed eligible for Radial Cystectomy (RC) by his/her oncologist and/or urologist, and must agree to undergo Radial Cystectomy (RC) after completion of neoadjuvant therapy.
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinical evidence of positive LN (â‰¥ 10 mm in short axis) or metastatic bladder cancer
- Prior systemic therapy, radiation therapy, or surgery for bladder cancer other than TURBT or biopsies is also not permitted
- Ineligible to receive cisplatin due to Grade 2 or higher peripheral neuropathy or audiometric hearing loss, or calculated (Cockcroft-Gault formula) GFR or measured (24-hour urine) creatinine clearance (CrCl) < 50 mL/min
